definition: will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: Zheng Mian low adjustment has 6 trading days, or choose the direction in the late.
sentences.chinese: 鄭棉在低位調整已6個交易日，後期或將選擇方向。

sentences.english: It is illegal to shake carpets in the street, or to throw orange peels on the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 在街上甩動地毯或將橘子皮丟在人行道上是違法的。

sentences.english: New submarines could help challenge any Chinese seaborne assault on the self-governing island, which Beijing reserves the right to take by force.
sentences.chinese: 新潛艇或將幫助臺灣挑戰中國大陸的海上進攻力量。

sentences.english: Arrange cups in medication preparation area or move medication cart to position outside client's room.
sentences.chinese: 在藥物準備區備好杯子，或將藥車推到病房外。

sentences.english: Some people burn weeds or bury them deeply or make them into mulch.
sentences.chinese: 有些人會燒掉或深埋雜草，或將它們變爲地膜。

sentences.english: He did say that further Refi-rate cuts were not to be discounted.
sentences.chinese: 他還表示，歐洲央行或將進一步下調再融資利率水平。

sentences.english: Please take either of the following methods in disposing capacitors.
sentences.chinese: 在電容器殼體上開孔或將電容器壓碎後焚燒。

sentences.english: Incinerate them after crushing capacitors or making a hole on the capacitor body.
sentences.chinese: 在電容器殼體上開孔或將電容器壓碎後焚燒。

sentences.english: Don' t tuck it into your belt or use it as a bib .
sentences.chinese: 不要把它塞在你的皮帶裏，或將其當作圍嘴兒用。

sentences.english: Yes proceeds to generate the change script or transmit the modifications to the database.
sentences.chinese: “是”將繼續生成更改腳本或將修改傳送到數據庫。

sentences.english: Any day now, you expect to hear rumblings about bringing back the 55 mile-per-hour speed limit.
sentences.chinese: 最近美國或將重拾55英里限速規定的傳言比比皆是。

sentences.english: Or will you use them to your own devious advantage?
sentences.chinese: 或將您使用他們自己的歪理邪說優勢？

sentences.english: Never bite straight into a roll, and refrain from cutting it in half and buttering.
sentences.chinese: 不要直接咬一卷麪包或將它只切成一半就放進油鍋煎。

sentences.english: At that time, the pontiff , Pope John Paul II may attend the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 屆時教宗若望保祿二世或將參加這次會議。

sentences.english: Through stormy ablution , internet industry of China or more will mature.
sentences.chinese: 經過暴風雨的洗禮，中國的互聯網行業或將更加成熟。

sentences.english: Infineon selling cellphone chip business to Intel?
sentences.chinese: 英飛凌或將出售手機芯片業務給英特爾？
